website_summaries.verdict: This dollhouse from the popular collectible range is so packed with extras that it works perfectly as a stand-alone option.
pros: Characteristic design exudes a great deal of charm not often found in other models
Fantastic detailing right down to the battery-operated lights
cons: Tiny accessories are easily misplaced and may pose a choking hazard for younger children

customer_reviews.title: 4 and 6 year olds have a lot of fun with this house
customer_reviews.text: My 3, 4 and 6 year olds have a lot of fun with this house. Absolutely fantastic for pretend play. It comes with tiny really cute accessories, two bunnies and 2 lights you can turn on and off. I purchased a CC kitchen set,CC living room set and CC nursery set. The sets fit in the house really well. My kids have exspressed that their critters still need a bathroom though. Love Calico Critters they are always adorable and great quality toys.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Duffer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute and well made. My girls got this for Christmas and they absolutely love it. They've played with every day. It was easy to assemble out of the box but my husband went the extra mile and super glued the pieces together. He said it was almost necessary since some of the connections were loose. At least this way we won't have to worry about pieces falling off easily during play. With that being said, I would definitely recommend having a tube of super glue handy while putting this house together. Overall I am very happy with this. The Calico Critters are adorable and my kids are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute !
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute, cute ! We bought the Calico Critters house, car, kitty cat family, and little bunny friends for out grand-daughters to play with when they are visiting our house. They REALLY love them. I think the Calico Critters set are their FAVORITE toys. They love them sooo much, that when it is time to put away the toys, all the toys go in the toy box and closet EXCEPT the Calico Critters. These have a special place on the fireplace hearth. The Calico Critters are the very first toys our grand-daughter go to every time they come to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Don Y

customer_reviews.title: Wonderl toy that is well made
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughters second birthday. She loves it! She will play with this and the Critters for hours on end, which is fabulous for this mommy! It does come with several small pieces that we did not give her to play with for several reasons...1) even though I'm fairly certain she would not put them in her mouth, we didn't want to give her the temptation of the little food. 2) I didn't want her to lose them and be upset at the chance we couldn't find them. So we will save them for when she is older. Overall it is a great playhouse that doesn't scream gaudy, cheap, plastic toy.
customer_reviews.author: IamHec

customer_reviews.title: Huge success with my 9 year old. She gets ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge success with my 9 year old. She gets hours and hours of play. I added two cozy cottages and made a little community.
customer_reviews.author: Smithy28

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: My three year old daughter loves it! My mom gave her money to spend for Christmas and this is what she picked out. She saw a commercial for it on TV. The house is so adorable and there are so many cute little details. Just a warning, if your child is still putting stuff in her mouth, there are a ton of small accessories so that may be dangerous. My daughter is over that phase so it was not a concern. Also, it only comes with two bunnies so I bought her a set of additional bunnies. Everything in this line is precious!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this house but it is somewhat of a pain for me. There are a million small pieces and the stairs and railing keep falling off. Update: At almost 4 years old now, my girl loves all the accessories and the dolls but rarely plays in the doll house because the rooms are not very accessible. I stand by my 3 star review of the house. Buy the dolls and accessories but invest in another house.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: cute creatures for play!
customer_reviews.text: We aw this at the store and looked online and found it on here for $30 cheaper! our daughter LOVES IT! the details and the lights and rooms are so much fun to use with play! I love that the people are animals! I think so many dolls are so un realistic these days so its cute to be able to play house with adorable fuzzy creatures!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended for Young Children
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old for christmas6, thinking it was perfect. The accessories are extremely small making this difficult for an adult to play with met alone a child. While cute, every dish even has a detachable lid, making thos set very easy to misplace. I feel like this set is made to set up as display and then alone. The smallest bump send tiny pieces flying everywhere. My husband put it together and the outside yard is supposed to attach at bottom. However again dont move it , the yard will fall off. Not made for young children
customer_reviews.author: Rlove

customer_reviews.title: The set up was easy. I was surprised by how many little tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She loves it! The set up was easy. I was surprised by how many little tiny pieces there were. Like, the toast to go in to the toaster. While I'm not worried about choking with my 4 year old I did put up the smaller pieces to avoid the inevitable crying when she losses them.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Burns

customer_reviews.title: No bargain on sale day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last week for one granddaughter spending $78.00. It was so cute... Today when trying to order a second one from Amazon for another granddaughter, price is over $103. Seems unreal for "cyber Monday"!!
customer_reviews.author: dtj7501

customer_reviews.title: My dream come true
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted the Sylvanian family animals as a little Japanese girl. They weren't sold in the States back then unfortunately. My dream came true when my daughter said she wanted the Calico Critter for Christmas (I think I'd been unknowingly sending her subliminal messages). It's well made, animals are cute, furniture are cute, makes me want to collect them all. More importantly, of course, I think my daughter enjoys playing with it and my son is obsessed with studying the house and playing with the light switches.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I’m living vicariously through my daughter, as these are little replications of the Mapletown figurines I played with is a girl. This little house lights up, and folds up for easy storage. Everything is well-made, and even though I’m 38, I could sit and play with this for hours! So adorbs!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN BACON

customer_reviews.title: Good quality 9 year old daughter wasn't interested in it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old daughter and she wasn't that interested in it. I'd recommend for a younger age. It was easy to put together. Needs 2 batteries and the whole thing lights up. Easy to fold up and store away. I'd recommend buying the gift set one because it comes with a lot of pieces. It's a good quality play house. My daughter just isn't really interested in toys but this was the top thing on her Christmas list and now it sits. She played with it maybe 25 min and hasn't pulled it back out.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Spot on!
customer_reviews.text: The house is beautiful. It is exactly what was picture and described. Putting it together for my daughter brought back memories of my childhood and playing with similar toys. Every little piece to this house is so detailed and spot on to real life, except they are critters. Its absolutely adorable and I recommend any parent to get if for their children.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Beedle

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter. I found it very cheaply made. The pieces were so tiny they were hard for a child to use. Also, the access to the rooms is very cramped so it’s almost impossible to play with it as a dollhouse. You must play with the items outside on the floor. Very frustrating to me. I anticipate lots of lost and broken pieces. Would not recommend or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: katherine d. gressle

customer_reviews.title: Great item, small pieces
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely adorable set. The little details are really what make this item so much fun! However, be warned, there are some seriously TINY pieces and it takes a lot of patience to set the house up as intended. My daughter, almost 4, loves this new toy, but we are going to have to keep it away from her 2-year-old brother.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bartell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: This cottage is wonderful! Not to mention it came with bonus furniture at a fantastic price. The detail in all these tiny pieces is incredible. I know my 10 year old daughter absolutely loves it. It's different than the "usual" doll houses and let's her use more of her imagination while playing. I love listening to her playing with it, and hearing the little things she comes up with in that imagination of hers. Props to whomever invented and designed this. It's nice to see something different on the market for a change. Great job, and I will definitely be purchasing more pieces for this.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Miller

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: my granddaughter loves calico critters and this house is amazing...the batteries run out because she forgets to turn the lights out, but the playtime is wonderful...i did have to set the house up on a basket because it is so low to the ground it is hard to see inside to move things around...wonderful gift
customer_reviews.author: shasta

customer_reviews.title: 6-yr-old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My six-year-old will spend hours with this. She loves it! She is excited to add new characters or furniture. We use that as a lesson in value: she has a certain amount of money and we shop. She quickly sees that her $5 birthday money will have to be saved until she has more. Fun lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice house and is a lot of fun to play ...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter has eyed and played with this house at the local toy store for a couple of years now and Santa made her dreams come true this Christmas! :) The details are so impressive...the working lights, the included furniture, the ability to move the steps, etc. This is a very nice house and is a lot of fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Love this house!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy little house and I love that it came with tons of furniture. Really enough that I wouldn’t of needed to buy anything else. We couldn’t figure out how to hang the little lace curtains but it didn’t matter. The little pictures for the wall were such a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Warner

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made, cute, lots of intricate details, great toy for many stories and lots of play time!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear3

customer_reviews.title: Calico Critters CLoverleaf TownHome set
customer_reviews.text: Great doll house set!!! Granddaughter approved! It will keep her happy for many years to come!! Some of the smaller pieces she is too young for at the moment but they will be added as she gets older. Her parents were very impressed with all the fine details of the pieces and labels etc.
customer_reviews.author: B.  Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Details
customer_reviews.text: love the product. pros: little tiny things are well painted and has clean cuts around it. no rough edges. very nice quality. cons: you need to be careful not to loose all the pieces. lack of instructions. instructions are on the box. it's really easy to miss them. i wish there was an instruction sheet to explain a little more.
customer_reviews.author: Sei C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected much higher quality, having purchased quite a bit of Calico Critters stuff for my teenager. This is just another hard plastic toy that even little hands have a hard time accessing and playing with. The stairs, railing, doors and windows are not white as shown on the box, but instead are a dull brownish gray color. I was really excited to give this to my toddler, and it was pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Fun playhouse
customer_reviews.text: This set is fun and our daughter loves playing with it. I will say that the stairs and banisters tend to come off fairly easy, but overall this is a great playset and has provided us with hours of entertainment.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Huge Calico Critter set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The house comes with lots of little furniture and even some animal people. Oh and there are actual working lights in the home. My daughter loves how she can do so much with this home. It is expensive but def. worth the price for the size and all that you get.
customer_reviews.author: T.Griggs

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old and 2 year old daughters love this Calico Critters Townhome
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old and 2 year old daughters love this Calico Critters Townhome. All of the items are really detailed. The toaster has tiny bread slices that fit in, and the lights in 2 rooms turn on with a switch. There are so many more details. This was a huge hit with my daughters. My nieces and nephews also like to play with it when they come over and visit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Lots of small pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great material, my daughter loves it. However it does have a lot of very very small pieces. It would be thoughtful to have included a pouch to hold the really small things but other wise still a very good toy
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Pulgar

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set the peices are very small though easy to lose but the house is beautiful and my daughter loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and very durable. Great for toddlers and bigger kid's
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's age 2 and 6 love this house. They play with it for hours and keep all the small pieces together with out losing them. Love the house because it does not take up a lot of space and folds up and be put away in a closet for future use. The other accessories are not super expensive and are durable so they will have this house for a while if they take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Calico Critters home
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4-yr-old granddaughter and she plays with it for hours. All the small detail is amazing--even little toast slices that you can put in the toaster. And the lights in the house are also a big hit. It is expensive though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Two light bulbs don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Our child likes it, but one seriously disappointing problem is that two light bulbs do not turn on. It seems two light bulbs are gone and there is no way to replace them here except sending the whole package back.
customer_reviews.author: Laserking19

customer_reviews.title: Good quality house.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this set for 8 months. It's a nice little house and everything is holding up just fine. We never did the wall paper thing and only have the furniture that came with the set. It's a good toy for imaginative play. I'd rather my kid played with her more than she does but she does still play with it some.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Rishmawi

customer_reviews.title: the critters are fine but the accessories to the house are tiny
customer_reviews.text: This set contains VERY SMALL pieces... the critters are fine but the accessories to the house are tiny; you almost need a tweezer to pick them up! Especially for grandparents playing with their grandkids!
customer_reviews.author: roxie forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and I think it’s a great quality and a lot of toy for the price Not flimsy like most
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford 7622189

customer_reviews.title: Small mansion
customer_reviews.text: Cute, little house. It's not as big as I thought it would be. Kind of tight quarters for all the furniture that you can buy to use with it. I did like the fact you can turn 2 lights off and on. My girls enjoy the house and have not complained about its tight rooms.
customer_reviews.author: D DeCosta

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for our 3 year old grand daughter and SHE LOVED IT! It provides lots of imagination and independent play! Even her 4 year old brother loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: I love the Calico Critter sets
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received this townhome for Christmas. She loves it. It is very cute and durable. This is one of those items that I will be saving for future grandkids to play with. I love the Calico Critter sets.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken/used.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter’s birthday. The box had definitely been opened before and there were loose parts rattling around not secured. The lights in the house do not work. Which is really disappointing, especially since it’s pretty dark in there with out any lights. Not worth the money for the quality we received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good and solid
customer_reviews.text: we have used the toy doll house for over a year and the little one loves this toy, great quality and she uses it often
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: What a merry Christmas is was!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had the best Christmas ever thanks to this gift. It was a great deal being just under $100 and having all the accessories already included
customer_reviews.author: L. Tomoyasu

customer_reviews.title: but We are very disappointed about how small it is for the price I ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it , its what she wanted, but We are very disappointed about how small it is for the price I don't feel it was a good buy it should it should have been about 20dollars its so small
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Love Doll

customer_reviews.title: Well made and intricately manufactured.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this dollhouse. There are a lot of tiny, intricate parts so it is important your child is mature enough to play with this toy. Very well made and the lighted chandeliers are really cute. Glad I purchased it for her!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Adorable house....girls still play with it a year half later & its holding up well...worth the expense & perfect for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made from very good material, easily put together and comes with everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Made from very good material, easily put together and comes with everything in the description. A little heads up, the screw to keep both sides of the house together is very small be careful when opening easy to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Shalena

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Toy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toy. Fairly easy to assemble with GOOD directions. The house and all of the accessories are of nice detail and seem quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Rice

customer_reviews.title: Aewsome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, (Well, no, meh mom did). There are small peices like toast that could get lost, but, it was awesome! BUY THIS! it aslo comes with figures itself, no need for going on a wild goose chase to get some figures! awesome tottes five stars. btw, sorry for meh grmmer just so lazy today. on a shopping spree!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Love this. There is a new version out though...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Please note 1 there is a new style out and 2 it comes with incredibly tiny pieces. Not for small children. But it is great and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my three year old daughter. She absolutely loves it and so do I! The house comes with some basic furniture to start off with. I did purchase some additional furniture and now she has more furniture than house! The accessories are extremely detailed and the craftsmanship is excellent! Thank you Calico Critters for making such an enjoyable and great looking product!
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials for the price. I called the distributor ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap materials for the price. I called the distributor as it was missing 2 pieces and they did not send them. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute but little pieces
customer_reviews.text: Lots of little pieces! Fairly easy to assemble. Assembly instructions are on the side of the box not an insert within the box.
customer_reviews.author: StngrX2

customer_reviews.title: Cute little critters!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's bday gift and she absolutely loved it. She especially loves that the lights really turn on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly as pictured. There was less to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as pictured. There was less to put together than I thought. It's big enough for my daughter to play with, but doesn't take up half of her room.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Wiggins Smith

customer_reviews.title: To many tiny pieces
customer_reviews.text: Its cute but most of the pieces are not used, to small, ok tiny!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Nice but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful house. Price is ridiculously high. Lights are extremely dim when they do work. Doesn't stay together. Had to super glue parts to keep them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Couture

customer_reviews.title: Very nice !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice !!! This is my daughters Christmas present. She asked for it after I showed it to her! She will be so happy /excited !!!
customer_reviews.author: John Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Tiny parts for tiny fingers. Very detailed tiny parts.
customer_reviews.text: We had gotten this for our 3 1/2 year old GRANDDAUGHTER for Christmas. She absolutely loved it. She is very good about handling these tiny little things. They are so detailed she plays for hours. She loves to bake so she understands the little stove. Peter Rabbitt will be visiting come Easter. By the way, even Mom loves playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Amann

customer_reviews.title: Calico Critters Home
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice addition to my granddaughter's Calico Critters Collection. She loves it, and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Needs 2A batteries
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it, we are getting furnished, has working lights
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and my 2 and 4 year old love the critters. I however am not happy with the quality. Pieces broke when we were putting it together and some pieces are so small they are hard to even play with.
customer_reviews.author: CKM

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this house I wish it was just a little big considering how much you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: No instructions included. So small it is hard for a small child to get hands in to play with critters and accesories. Should have bought a bigger doll house for the critters.
customer_reviews.author: JPax

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cute Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Big Hit! Lots of fun. Purchased for 7 year old and is played with by her and sisters aged 11 and 3.
customer_reviews.author: Meme B

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Great toy well made watch my granddaughter playing for hours every day
customer_reviews.author: Frank D.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My neice loved this house. And the price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Emmaline Orr

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Easy to assemble. Comes with cute furniture and tiny accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: My little 4 year old girl loves her calico toys !
customer_reviews.author: From Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loved it. The only complaint I have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I usually don't write reviews but I will this time. I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loved it. The only complaint I have is that there wasn't an instruction manual or diagram showing how to put the few parts that have to be put together, together. If not for that then I would definitely give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Urian D.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter was obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays with this with her ponies and is obsessed. Such a cute house and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fiabella Photography

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this house. Some of the pieces are mighty small, though!
customer_reviews.author: hdaemon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 3 and 6 year old grand daughters love this. It's sturdy and will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Julee

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts :(
customer_reviews.text: Cute house. But like others said—missing parts. Couldn’t find anywhere to contact seller, and other posters said they don’t replace the missing parts anyways. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LLRN

customer_reviews.title: the toy box seemed like it went through a lot of tossing around but ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered this for my 2 daughters for christmas, arrived very quickly. the toy box seemed like it went through a lot of tossing around but doesn't seem to be opened or severely damaged so its not a big deal. I know they are going to love it! I would recommend this product to a friend
customer_reviews.author: KellieG

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space.
customer_reviews.text: There are lots of rooms, the stairs can be placed in multiple locations, there is an attachable floor to create more room, there is a wall that moves and lights that really work. My 9yo loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: ... loves all things Calico Critters so this townhome seemed like the perfect "big" Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves all things Calico Critters so this townhome seemed like the perfect "big" Christmas gift. She loves arranging the furniture in various ways and changing the room configurations. The assembly is easy and the accessories are abundant. There are two lights (one upstairs and one downstairs) that really add a nice, realistic touch to playing. I don't like that you have to download the wallpapers because who knows when I'll get around to that but my daughter hasn't missed them. I thought this was such a good deal that I bought another one for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8kiddos

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, fun, lots of imaginative play possibilities
customer_reviews.text: super cute house! Lights a huge hit! For play value you will need to purchase at least a couple of furniture sets to start, but expanding over time is part of the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Townhome
customer_reviews.text: This townhome is easy to put together and with all the critters is nice toy for a toddler and up i think to 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: wilma wan

customer_reviews.title: my 5 and 2 yr old grandaughters love both these and the calico critters line of toys ...
customer_reviews.text: my 5 and 2 yr old grandaughters love both these and the calico critters line of toys they will play for hours with their pretend families
customer_reviews.author: Richard Witherite

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Arrived well packaged and in a timely ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Arrived well packaged and in a timely manner. A bit on the pricey side. I wish they would include more furniture with the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: calico critters luxury townhouse
customer_reviews.text: gift for kid for christmas hope she will enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: James Parris

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner
customer_reviews.text: Most successful present of the Christmas season. Daughter (3 years old) loves it. Only (minor) issue is the small accessories have to be kept away from our younger child. But there are so many pieces, we're just extending the gifting by release if the small pieces over time.
customer_reviews.author: Brion McGinn

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old granddaughter loves loves loves this beautiful, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old granddaughter loves loves loves this beautiful, well constructed, adorable playhouse. So do her older sister, age 10.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Bonita

customer_reviews.title: did not  come with extras
customer_reviews.text: Missing parts. Did not come with furniture or critters as described
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey Andary

customer_reviews.title: It's great. My only wish is that the pieces of ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great. My only wish is that the pieces of the house would attach more securely. They fall off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Cristal

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old daughter loves it. Lots of pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old daughter loves it. Lots of pieces (furniture, utensils, food, etc.) come with it, so worth getting the gift set.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. Arrived in badly damaged box.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Purchased for my sister as a birthday gift. However, the box arrived severely damaged.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable

product_meta.title: Calico Critters Luxury Townhome Gift Set
product_meta.description:
Size:Basic packCalico Critters Luxury Townhome Gift Set comes with more than 50 pieces, giving you a great start building your Calico Critters dream home. The house has 2 floors and opens for easy access to the 4 main rooms. Includes stairs, railings, working lights, furniture, and so much more! Calico Critters is a unique and adorable range of distinctive animal characters with charming and beautifully detailed homes, furniture and accessories. They live, work and play in an idyllic and wonderful place called Calico Village. These timeless, classic toys promote wholesome family values. These life-like, award-winning miniatures also inspire imagination and creativity. These adorable toys promote healthy cognitive development through pretend play. Acting out storylines will exercise narrative and critical thinking processes, while fine motor skills and dexterity improve as little ones manipulate the fun environments, critters and accessories. 

Red Roof Country Home Gift Set can be opened up for play at 90-degrees, 180-degrees, and any angle in between. Closing up the house creates the appearance of a wonderful home, no matter which angle you look at it from, with light spilling out through the windows making quite the sight to behold.

The second floor room on the left side, and the roof on the right side are removable. Placing this room on top of the roof, or placing the roof on top of the terrace creates a large, three-story house to play with. Both Hopscotch Rabbit Girl and Hopscotch Rabbit Mother are included. Have fun using the furniture included to create and play with a kitchen, children's playroom, bedroom, etc. 

Connect to Red Roof Cozy Cottage to create a large, three-story house (sold separately). Have an even more enjoyable experience playing with additional figures, furniture, cars, etc. (sold separately). 

Main Unit, Chimney Room, Large Roof, Small Roof, Stairs, Entrance Porch, Window Frame A x3, Window Frame B x2, Small Fence x3, Large Fence x5, Lamp A x2, Lamp B x1, Hopscotch Rabbit Girl, Hopscotch Rabbit Mother, Table, Dining Room Chair x4, Car, Bread Box, Basket, Coffee Maker (Top), Coffee Maker (Bottom), Toaster Oven, Pot, Pot Lid, Mixer, Mixer Lid, Hot Plate, Hot Plate Lid, Rice Cooker, Rice Cooker Lid, Place Mat x2, Plate x2, Mug x2, Cup x2, Strawberry Jam, Marmalade, Fork x2, Spoon x2, Jam Spreader, Wooden Spatula, Bread x2, Child's Desk, Child's Desk Chair, Pen Stand, Color Pencil x2, Piano, Piano Stool, Oven, Frying Pan, Adult Bed, Blanket (a total of 72 pieces)
feature_bullets: Includes 2 Critters, 5 room townhome with working lights, indoor and outdoor balconies with rails, working doors, outdoor patio floor, dining set, piano and bench, desk, kitchen stove, pan, cart with appliances and much more.
Sweatpea Rabbit Nikki measures approximately 3” tall and Rebecca is approximately 2.25” tall
Luxury Townhome measures 12” x 12” x 12” closed, 21” x 21” x 12” opened
Can be used independently or with all Calico Critters houses
Mix and match with other Calico Critters play sets to create a whole Calico Critters village!
